name: remembrance angel
notes:
crochet a meaningful **remembrance angel** to honor loved ones or gift as a handmade keepsake.
  
this pattern is crocheted in one piece from the head to the skirt using **red heart super saver yarn (medium \[4\])** and a **4 mm (g) crochet hook**. you’ll need about **35 g (64 yds)** of yarn, so one skein makes approximately **5 angels**.
  
simple stitches — **sc, hdc, fphdc, fpsc, sc2tog, tr, and dtr** — create beautiful texture and shape. the angel stands on her own and can be personalized with glitter, bells, or ribbons.
  
skill level: easy
yarn: red heart super saver (medium \[4\])
hook: 4 mm (g)
finished size: approx. 4.5 in (11.5 cm) tall
  
free pattern available on my website.
premium ad-free pdf also available here for easy printing.
